name: Creamy Italian Pasta Salad
author: Alexandra Girardi
summary: This is my favorite pasta salad recipe based on years of making it for BBQs and family get-togethers. A little bit of everything in this Italian dish.
ingredients: ½ cup pepperoni, cut into quarters
1 (8 ounce) bottle creamy Italian salad dressing (such as Wish-Bone®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Meanwhile, place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add broccoli, cover, and steam until tender, 4 to 6 minutes
Cut cheeses into small cubes and combine in a large bowl with pasta, broccoli, ham, cherry tomatoes, olives, and pepperoni
Season with salt, pepper, oregano, and paprika
